inference:
The original figure has 13 blue tiles and 6 green tiles. Adding a border of green tiles to this figure will add 12 green tiles, 4 on each side. The new figure will have 13 blue tiles and 6 + 12 = 18 green tiles. The difference between the total number of green tiles and blue tiles is 18 - 13 = 5.

Final Answer: $\boxed{5}$. I hope it is correct.
